title: lang-item-public.rs run-pass test fails

labels.name: A-testsuite
labels.description: Area: The testsuite used to check the correctness of rustc

body:
When configured with `./configure --enable-rpath --disable-clang --disable-libcpp --enable-llvm-assertions --release-channel=dev --enable-debug --enable-optimize` on linux, running tests will fail with

```
---- [run-pass] run-pass/lang-item-public.rs stdout ----

error: compilation failed!
status: exit code: 101
command: x86_64-unknown-linux-gnu/stage1/bin/rustc /home/nagisa/Documents/rust/rust/src/test/run-pass/lang-item-public.rs -L x86_64-unknown-linux-gnu/test/run-pass/ --target=x86_64-unknown-linux-gnu -L x86_64-unknown-linux-gnu/test/run-pass/lang-item-public.stage1-x86_64-unknown-linux-gnu.run-pass.libaux -C prefer-dynamic -o x86_64-unknown-linux-gnu/test/run-pass/lang-item-public.stage1-x86_64-unknown-linux-gnu --cfg rtopt -C rpath -O -L x86_64-unknown-linux-gnu/rt
stdout:
------------------------------------------

------------------------------------------
stderr:
------------------------------------------
error: linking with `cc` failed: exit code: 1
note: "cc" "-Wl,--as-needed" "-m64" "-L" "/home/nagisa/Documents/rust/rust/x86_64-unknown-linux-gnu/stage1/lib/rustlib/x86_64-unknown-linux-gnu/lib" "x86_64-unknown-linux-gnu/test/run-pass/lang-item-public.0.o" "-o" "x86_64-unknown-linux-gnu/test/run-pass/lang-item-public.stage1-x86_64-unknown-linux-gnu" "-Wl,--whole-archive" "-l" "morestack" "-Wl,--no-whole-archive" "-Wl,--gc-sections" "-pie" "-Wl,-O1" "-nodefaultlibs" "-L" "/home/nagisa/Documents/rust/rust/x86_64-unknown-linux-gnu/test/run-pass/lang-item-public.stage1-x86_64-unknown-linux-gnu.run-pass.libaux" "-l" "lang_item_public" "-L" "x86_64-unknown-linux-gnu/test/run-pass/" "-L" "x86_64-unknown-linux-gnu/test/run-pass/lang-item-public.stage1-x86_64-unknown-linux-gnu.run-pass.libaux" "-L" "x86_64-unknown-linux-gnu/rt" "-L" "/home/nagisa/Documents/rust/rust/x86_64-unknown-linux-gnu/stage1/lib/rustlib/x86_64-unknown-linux-gnu/lib" "-L" "/home/nagisa/Documents/rust/rust/.rust/lib/x86_64-unknown-linux-gnu" "-L" "/home/nagisa/Documents/rust/rust/lib/x86_64-unknown-linux-gnu" "-Wl,-Bstatic" "-Wl,-Bdynamic" "-l" "c" "-l" "m" "-Wl,-rpath,$ORIGIN/lang-item-public.stage1-x86_64-unknown-linux-gnu.run-pass.libaux" "-Wl,-rpath,/usr/local/lib/rustlib/x86_64-unknown-linux-gnu/lib" "-l" "compiler-rt"
note: /home/nagisa/Documents/rust/rust/x86_64-unknown-linux-gnu/test/run-pass/lang-item-public.stage1-x86_64-unknown-linux-gnu.run-pass.libaux/liblang_item_public.so: undefined reference to `_Unwind_Resume'
collect2: error: ld returned 1 exit status

error: aborting due to previous error

------------------------------------------

thread '[run-pass] run-pass/lang-item-public.rs' panicked at 'explicit panic', /home/nagisa/Documents/rust/rust/src/compiletest/runtest.rs:1490
```
